search_term: Find the official pricing page URL for BookFunnel (bookfunnel.com). Only provide the exact URL to the pricing page, not a summary of pricing information.
response_text: The official pricing page for BookFunnel is: [https://bookfunnel.com/pricing/](https://bookfunnel.com/pricing/)【3:0†source】.

The Right Plan For You
----------------------

A plan for everyone, no matter where you are in your author journey.

_Give us a try risk-free! If we aren’t the right service for you, let us know within 30 days and we’ll refund your payment in full._

The Right Plan For You

A plan for everyone, no matter where you are in your author journey.

_Give us a try risk-free! If we aren’t the right service for you, let us know within 30 days and we’ll refund your payment in full._

Author Plan Comparison
----------------------

|  | First-Time Author | Mid-List | Bestseller |
| --- | --- | --- | --- |
| Monthly Price | \- | $10 | $25 |
| Annual Price (2 Months Free) | $20 | $100 | $250 |
| Pen Names | 1 Pen Name | 2 Pen Names | 3 Pen Names |
| Deliver Reader Magnet Ebooks | Yes | Yes | Yes |
| Downloads | 500 | 5,000 | Unlimited |
| Storage | Unlimited | Unlimited | Unlimited |
| Deliver Audiobooks | No | Available [(Pricing)](https://bookfunnel.com/pricing/#audiobook-chart) | Available [(Pricing)](https://bookfunnel.com/pricing/#audiobook-chart) |
| Deliver Books using the BookFunnel Mobile App | Yes | Yes | Yes |
| Enable Book Download or Delivery to Other Apps | Yes | Yes | Yes |
| Industry's Best Support | Yes | Yes | Yes |
| Orientations & Webinars | Yes | Yes | Yes |
| Landing Pages | Yes | Yes | Yes |
| Bundle Landing Pages | Yes | Yes | Yes |
| Group Promos | Yes | Yes | Yes |
| Author Swaps | Yes | Yes | Yes |
| Custom Domains | Yes | Yes | Yes |
| Custom Themes | Yes | Yes | Yes |
| Mailing List Integration | No | Available\* | 3 Mailing List Services |
| Email Collection | No | Yes | Yes |
| Print Codes | No | Yes | Yes |
| Direct Sales Delivery | No | Yes | Yes |
| Crowdsourcing Campaign Delivery | No | Yes | Yes |
| Short Audio | No | Yes | Yes |
| Watermarked Files | No | Yes | Yes |
| Book Gifting | No | Yes | Yes |
| Printable Download Codes | No | Yes | Yes |
| Secure ARC Delivery | No | Yes | Yes |
| Priority Support | No | No | Yes |

\*Integrate with up to two mailing list services by adding Direct Integration to the Mid-List Author plan for only $50/year or $5/month

[Return to the top](https://bookfunnel.com/pricing/#)

Audiobook Pricing
-----------------

| Plan | 5,000 Delivered Hours of Audio/Month | Unlimited Delivered Hours of Audio |
| --- | --- | --- |
| Monthly Pricing | $15 | $25 |
| Annual Pricing (2 Months Free) | $150 | $250 |
| Extra 5,000 DHA in a month | $15 | n/a |

pricing_data.pricing_notes: Annual plans offer a discount equivalent to two months free compared to monthly plans.

additional_fees.fee_description: Integrate with up to two mailing list services for Mid-List Author plan.
